microprocessor.name: Quad Controller
microprocessor.description: A controller made for controlling various quad related systems

node.label: Battery 1
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Gas pedal
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Throttle
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Battery light color
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Speed
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Breaking power
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Breaking
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Battery 2
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

object.script:
lastGas = 0 cap = 0.3
function clamp(value, min, max) if value > max then return max end if value < min then return min end return value end
function onTick() battery = input.getNumber(1) battery = (battery + input.getNumber(4)) / 2 gas = input.getNumber(2) speed = input.getNumber(3) breaking = input.getBool(1)
--Drop gas quicker if lastGas > cap and gas <= cap then gas = 0 end
--Calculate light values according to battery if battery > 0.5 then green = 1 red = 1 - (math.abs(battery - 0.5) * 2) elseif battery <= 0.5 then green = 1 - (math.abs(battery - 0.5) * 2) red = 1 end
output.setNumber(1, red) output.setNumber(2, green) output.setNumber(3, 0)
--Calculate breaking power if breaking then breakingPower = 1 - clamp((speed / 60), 0, 1) + 0.2 else breakingPower = 0 end
output.setNumber(5, breakingPower)
--Less throtle if there is a lot of charge left throtle = (1 - battery) + 0.15 throtle = throtle * gas
output.setNumber(4, throtle)
lastGas = gas end

c1.script:
lastGas = 0 cap = 0.3
function clamp(value, min, max) if value > max then return max end if value < min then return min end return value end
function onTick() battery = input.getNumber(1) battery = (battery + input.getNumber(4)) / 2 gas = input.getNumber(2) speed = input.getNumber(3) breaking = input.getBool(1)
--Drop gas quicker if lastGas > cap and gas <= cap then gas = 0 end
--Calculate light values according to battery if battery > 0.5 then green = 1 red = 1 - (math.abs(battery - 0.5) * 2) elseif battery <= 0.5 then green = 1 - (math.abs(battery - 0.5) * 2) red = 1 end
output.setNumber(1, red) output.setNumber(2, green) output.setNumber(3, 0)
--Calculate breaking power if breaking then breakingPower = 1 - clamp((speed / 60), 0, 1) + 0.2 else breakingPower = 0 end
output.setNumber(5, breakingPower)
--Less throtle if there is a lot of charge left throtle = (1 - battery) + 0.15 throtle = throtle * gas
output.setNumber(4, throtle)
lastGas = gas end
